ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The magicians threw themselves down in prostration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The sorcerers fell to the ground in homage,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the magicians flung themselves prostrate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the magicians were obliged to fall prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the sorcerers fell down prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the enchanters were thrown down, prostrating (themselves).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the sorcerers were cast down, bowing themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the wizards fell down prostrate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the magicians flung themselves prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the magicians fell down in prostration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the sorcerers fell down prostrate in adoration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the sorcerers fell down prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the magicians fell to their knees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:120] And the sorcerers fell down in prostration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the wizards fell down prostrate) to Allah; it is also said that they prostrated themselves so fast, that it seemed as if they had fallen prostrate,
